about_the_game:
Embark on an intimate journey through the remnants of a post-apocalyptic world in this heartfelt single-player adventure game. Take on the roles of two sisters, each blessed with unique abilities, as they collaborate to surmount obstacles and unearth the secrets shrouding their past.


Upgrade your camp to increase your strength, stamina, and spirit for the treacherous journey ahead. Pick up resources along the way and meet a small cast of other explorers in this weird landscape.


Solve puzzles to unlock new areas and be wary of the environment for clues on how to solve them. Unlock new abilities to help with the purpose of both combat but also dealing with the evil creatures along the roads of the forest.


As players traverse the desolate landscapes, they'll gradually unveil fragments of the sisters' memories, immersing themselves in a narrative that explores themes of identity, resilience, and the unbreakable bonds of sisterhood.


Crafted with dedication and passion by a close-knit team of six students from ITU Copenhagen, this cozy adventure invites players into a world brimming with charm and nuance. With its captivating visuals, poignant storytelling, and inventive gameplay mechanics, this indie gem promises an unforgettable experience.

  • OS: 10

short_description: Step into a beautifully crafted world, where you'll embark on an emotional journey filled with intrigue and danger. Explore the touching relationship of two sisters, their struggle for survival, and their unwavering determination in a world where the past crumbles and the future is uncertain.
